content.value:
Here is the #1 most important career advice I can give:

DO NOT HAVE A TWITTER PROFILE FULL OF GATEKEEPY SHIT TAKES.

Roughly, more than 3 consecutive tweets totally missing your own privilege with less than ~18 marginalised people followed is a career danger zone.
